name: One Night at Foxy's
description:
This game is inspired from "Five nights at freddy's" and it has a short game play

A Fnaf fan game created with the same engine that the original game was made with: ClickTeam Fusion 2.5(All the sounds and images that are used in this game, are created by Scout Cawthon)

Same mechanics as Fnaf 1 has but there is no way to close the doors.(So don't waste your time looking for a button to push)

Try your best to keep the Foxy away from the office. Good luck!
